sqlMap.select: select APPLICATION_ID, INDIVIDUAL_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE, INSTITUTION_CODE, STUDENT_NUMBER, LANGUAGE_CODE, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MAIL_STREET_1, MAIL_STREET_2, MAIL_APARTMENT, MAIL_CITY, MAIL_PROVINCE_CODE, MAIL_POSTAL_CODE, MAIL_COUNTRY, MAIL_PHONE_NUMBER, DATE_OF_BIRTH, GENDER, CITIZENSHIP_CODE, DISABLED_FLAG, MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, CHILDREN_AGED_0_TO_11, CHILDREN_12_OR_OLDER, DISABLED_CHILDREN_12_OR_OLDER, DAY_CARE_COSTS, PERM_STREET, PERM_APARTMENT, PERM_CITY, PERM_PROVINCE_CODE, PERM_POSTAL_CODE, PERM_PHONE_NUMBER, HAD_PT_GR_BEFORE, SUCCESSFUL_COMPLETION, STUDENT_EMP_STATUS_CODE, STUDENT_HOURS, STUDENT_CURR_YR_TOTAL_INCOME, PARTNER_HAS_SIN, PARTNER_SIN, SPOUSE_EMP_STATUS_CODE, SPOUSE_HOURS, PARTNER_CURR_YR_TOTAL_INCOME, RRSP_NET_VALUE, TOTAL_OTHER_ASSETS, HAD_CSL_BEFORE, HAD_PT_BEFORE, OUTSTANDING_PT_CSL, CAMPUS, PROGRAM_NAME, NUMBER_OF_COURSES, NUMBER_OF_INCLASS, NUMBER_OF_DISTANCE, NUMBER_OF_CORRESPONDANCE, TYPE_OF_INSTRUCTION, PROGRAM_START_DATE, PROGRAM_END_DATE, TUITION_FEES, COMPULSORY_FEES, BOOK_FEE, PERCENTAGE_OF_COURSE_LOAD, STUDY_PERIOD_WEEKS, PROGRAM_TOTAL_HOURS, BAR_CODE, APPLICATION_TYPE_CODE, DEFAULT_OF_CSL_FLAG, LAST_ATTENDED_FT_HIGH_SCHOOL, APPLICATION_STATUS_CODE, APPLICATION_SUBMITTED_DATE, BATCH_TRANSFER_DATE, BATCH_TRANSFER_NUMBER, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE from ${corept_schema}.APPLICATION where APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.update: update ${corept_schema}.APPLICATION set INDIVIDUAL_ID = #individualId:DECIMAL#, ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #accountNumber:DECIMAL#, APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE = #applicationReceivedDate:TIMESTAMP#, INSTITUTION_CODE = #institutionCode:VARCHAR#, STUDENT_NUMBER = #studentNumber:VARCHAR#, LANGUAGE_CODE = #languageCode:DECIMAL#, LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#, FIRST_NAME = #firstName:VARCHAR#, MAIL_STREET_1 = #mailStreet1:VARCHAR#, MAIL_STREET_2 = #mailStreet2:VARCHAR#, MAIL_APARTMENT = #mailApartment:VARCHAR#, MAIL_CITY = #mailCity:VARCHAR#, MAIL_PROVINCE_CODE = #mailProvinceCode:VARCHAR#, MAIL_POSTAL_CODE = #mailPostalCode:VARCHAR#, MAIL_COUNTRY = #mailCountry:VARCHAR#, MAIL_PHONE_NUMBER = #mailPhoneNumber:VARCHAR#, DATE_OF_BIRTH = #dateOfBirth:TIMESTAMP#, GENDER = #gender:VARCHAR#, CITIZENSHIP_CODE = #citizenshipCode:VARCHAR#, DISABLED_FLAG = #disabledFlag:VARCHAR#, MARITAL_STATUS_CODE = #maritalStatusCode:VARCHAR#, CHILDREN_AGED_0_TO_11 = #childrenAged0To11:DECIMAL#, CHILDREN_12_OR_OLDER = #children12OrOlder:DECIMAL#, DISABLED_CHILDREN_12_OR_OLDER = #disabledChildren12OrOlder:DECIMAL#, DAY_CARE_COSTS = #dayCareCosts:DECIMAL#, PERM_STREET = #permStreet:VARCHAR#, PERM_APARTMENT = #permApartment:VARCHAR#, PERM_CITY = #permCity:VARCHAR#, PERM_PROVINCE_CODE = #permProvinceCode:VARCHAR#, PERM_POSTAL_CODE = #permPostalCode:VARCHAR#, PERM_PHONE_NUMBER = #permPhoneNumber:VARCHAR#, HAD_PT_GR_BEFORE = #hadPtGrBefore:VARCHAR#, SUCCESSFUL_COMPLETION = #successfulCompletion:VARCHAR#, STUDENT_EMP_STATUS_CODE = #studentEmpStatusCode:VARCHAR#, STUDENT_HOURS = #studentHours:DECIMAL#, STUDENT_CURR_YR_TOTAL_INCOME = #studentCurrYrTotalIncome:DECIMAL#, PARTNER_HAS_SIN = #partnerHasSin:VARCHAR#, PARTNER_SIN = #partnerSin:VARCHAR#, SPOUSE_EMP_STATUS_CODE = #spouseEmpStatusCode:VARCHAR#, SPOUSE_HOURS = #spouseHours:DECIMAL#, PARTNER_CURR_YR_TOTAL_INCOME = #partnerCurrYrTotalIncome:DECIMAL#, RRSP_NET_VALUE = #rrspNetValue:DECIMAL#, TOTAL_OTHER_ASSETS = #totalOtherAssets:DECIMAL#, HAD_CSL_BEFORE = #hadCslBefore:VARCHAR#, HAD_PT_BEFORE = #hadPtBefore:VARCHAR#, OUTSTANDING_PT_CSL = #outstandingPtCsl:DECIMAL#, CAMPUS = #campus:VARCHAR#, PROGRAM_NAME = #programName:VARCHAR#, NUMBER_OF_COURSES = #numberOfCourses:DECIMAL#, NUMBER_OF_INCLASS = #numberOfInclass:DECIMAL#, NUMBER_OF_DISTANCE = #numberOfDistance:DECIMAL#, NUMBER_OF_CORRESPONDANCE = #numberOfCorrespondance:DECIMAL#, TYPE_OF_INSTRUCTION = #typeOfInstruction:VARCHAR#, PROGRAM_START_DATE = #programStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, PROGRAM_END_DATE = #programEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, TUITION_FEES = #tuitionFees:DECIMAL#, COMPULSORY_FEES = #compulsoryFees:DECIMAL#, BOOK_FEE = #bookFee:DECIMAL#, PERCENTAGE_OF_COURSE_LOAD = #percentageOfCourseLoad:DECIMAL#, STUDY_PERIOD_WEEKS = #studyPeriodWeeks:DECIMAL#, PROGRAM_TOTAL_HOURS = #programTotalHours:DECIMAL#, BAR_CODE = #barCode:DECIMAL#, APPLICATION_TYPE_CODE = #applicationTypeCode:VARCHAR#, DEFAULT_OF_CSL_FLAG = #defaultOfCslFlag:VARCHAR#, LAST_ATTENDED_FT_HIGH_SCHOOL = #lastAttendedFtHighSchool:VARCHAR#, APPLICATION_STATUS_CODE = #applicationStatusCode:VARCHAR#, APPLICATION_SUBMITTED_DATE = #applicationSubmittedDate:TIMESTAMP#, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #lastModifiedBy:VARCHAR#, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #lastModifiedDate:TIMESTAMP# where APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ${corept_schema}.APPLICATION ( APPLICATION_ID, INDIVIDUAL_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, APPLICATION_STATUS_CODE, APPLICATION_TYPE_CODE, BAR_CODE ) values ( #applicationId:DECIMAL#, #individualId:DECIMAL#, #lastModifiedBy:VARCHAR#, #lastModifiedDate:TIMESTAMP#, #createdBy:VARCHAR#, #createdDate:TIMESTAMP#, '7', '1', ${corept_schema}.BAR_CODE_SEQ.nextval )
sqlMap.select: select APPLICATION_ID, INDIVIDUAL_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE, INSTITUTION_CODE, STUDENT_NUMBER, LANGUAGE_CODE, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MAIL_STREET_1, MAIL_STREET_2, MAIL_APARTMENT, MAIL_CITY, MAIL_PROVINCE_CODE, MAIL_POSTAL_CODE, MAIL_COUNTRY, MAIL_PHONE_NUMBER, DATE_OF_BIRTH, GENDER, CITIZENSHIP_CODE, DISABLED_FLAG, MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, CHILDREN_AGED_0_TO_11, CHILDREN_12_OR_OLDER, DISABLED_CHILDREN_12_OR_OLDER, DAY_CARE_COSTS, PERM_STREET, PERM_APARTMENT, PERM_CITY, PERM_PROVINCE_CODE, PERM_POSTAL_CODE, PERM_PHONE_NUMBER, HAD_PT_GR_BEFORE, SUCCESSFUL_COMPLETION, STUDENT_EMP_STATUS_CODE, STUDENT_HOURS, STUDENT_CURR_YR_TOTAL_INCOME, PARTNER_HAS_SIN, PARTNER_SIN, SPOUSE_EMP_STATUS_CODE, SPOUSE_HOURS, PARTNER_CURR_YR_TOTAL_INCOME, RRSP_NET_VALUE, TOTAL_OTHER_ASSETS, HAD_CSL_BEFORE, HAD_PT_BEFORE, OUTSTANDING_PT_CSL, CAMPUS, PROGRAM_NAME, NUMBER_OF_COURSES, NUMBER_OF_INCLASS, NUMBER_OF_DISTANCE, NUMBER_OF_CORRESPONDANCE, TYPE_OF_INSTRUCTION, PROGRAM_START_DATE, PROGRAM_END_DATE, TUITION_FEES, COMPULSORY_FEES, BOOK_FEE, PERCENTAGE_OF_COURSE_LOAD, STUDY_PERIOD_WEEKS, PROGRAM_TOTAL_HOURS, BAR_CODE, APPLICATION_TYPE_CODE, DEFAULT_OF_CSL_FLAG, LAST_ATTENDED_FT_HIGH_SCHOOL, APPLICATION_STATUS_CODE, APPLICATION_SUBMITTED_DATE, BATCH_TRANSFER_DATE, BATCH_TRANSFER_NUMBER, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE from ${corept_schema}.APPLICATION where INDIVIDUAL_ID = #individualId:DECIMAL#
